text: vetattai utaiyoril evarkal nirakarittuk kontiruntanaro, avarkalai avarkalutaiya vitukaliliruntu mutal veliyerrattil veliyerriyavan avane, eninum avarkal veliyeruvarkal enru ninkal ninaikkavillai, avarkalum, tankalutaiya kottaikal niccayamaka allahvai vittum tankalait tatuttuk kolpavai enru ninaittarkal; anal, avarkal enniyirata purattiliruntu avarkalpal allah (vetanaiyaik kontu) vantu avarkalutaiya itayankalil pitiyaiyum pottan, anriyum avarkal tam kaikalalum muhminkalin kaikalalum tam vitukalai alittuk kontanar enave akapparvaiyutaiyore!
